author: ggrekhov
msg: Add ping test (currently with hardcoded host address)

author: jfthomps
msg: added $VCLversion global variable that is set in index.php as the current version of VCL. This is then used when javascript files are included in the page headers as an appended query variable in the form of somefile.js?v=$v where $v is locally set to $VCLversion. This makes browsers reload the javascript file whenever $VCLversion is changed so that people don't end up with old, cached javascript files with new code, resulting in things not working correctly. For whatever, we're regularly seeing apache and browsers think the javascript files have not been modified since the browser last loaded them when they actually have.

author: julianfoad
msg: Update and expand the 'MERGEINFO MERGE SOURCE NORMALIZATION' example at

repository, to describe where there is a gap in the revision numbers, and
to show the information in a more digestible form using diagrams.
